task:
Better Date Pattern Handling:

Instead of using test-specific cases, develop more robust regex patterns that can handle all date format variations
Implement more general date normalization functions that work with real-world resume text
Pattern Optimization:

Further optimize pattern matching to reduce processing time
Group related patterns together for more efficient processing
Universal Pattern Library:

Move pattern definitions to a dedicated configuration file
Create a pattern library that can be easily updated and maintained
Test Coverage Expansion:

Add more real-world test cases from different resume formats
Implement property-based testing for validating pattern fixes
Performance Profiling:

Measure the impact of each pattern fix on processing time
Identify and optimize patterns with the highest performance impact
